org.apache.flink.runtime.leaderelection

类 ZooKeeperLeaderElectionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.leaderelection.ZooKeeperLeaderElectionService
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.curator.framework.api.UnhandledErrorListener, org.apache.curator.framework.recipes.cache.NodeCacheListener, org.apache.curator.framework.recipes.leader.LeaderLatchListener, LeaderElectionService

    public class ZooKeeperLeaderElectionService
extends java.lang.Object
implements LeaderElectionService, org.apache.curator.framework.recipes.leader.LeaderLatchListener, org.apache.curator.framework.recipes.cache.NodeCacheListener, org.apache.curator.framework.api.UnhandledErrorListener
    Leader election service for multiple JobManager. The leading JobManager is elected using ZooKeeper. The current leader's address as well as its leader session ID is published via ZooKeeper as well.

    • 字段概要

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ZooKeeperLeaderElectionService

        public ZooKeeperLeaderElectionService(org.apache.curator.framework.CuratorFramework client,
                                      java.lang.String latchPath,
                                      java.lang.String leaderPath)
        Creates a ZooKeeperLeaderElectionService object.
        参数:
        client - Client which is connected to the ZooKeeper quorum
        latchPath - ZooKeeper node path for the leader election latch
        leaderPath - ZooKeeper node path for the node which stores the current leader information

    • 方法详细资料

      • getLeaderSessionID

        public java.util.UUID getLeaderSessionID()
        Returns the current leader session ID or null, if the contender is not the leader.
        返回:
        The last leader session ID or null, if the contender is not the leader

      • confirmLeaderSessionID

        public void confirmLeaderSessionID(java.util.UUID leaderSessionID)
        从接口复制的说明: LeaderElectionService
        Confirms that the new leader session ID has been successfully received by the new leader. This method is usually called by the newly appointed LeaderContender. The rational behind this method is to establish an order between setting the new leader session ID in the LeaderContender and publishing the new leader session ID to the leader retrieval services.
        指定者:
        confirmLeaderSessionID 在接口中 LeaderElectionService
        参数:
        leaderSessionID - The new leader session ID

      • hasLeadership

        public boolean hasLeadership()
        从接口复制的说明: LeaderElectionService
        Returns true if the LeaderContender with which the service has been started owns currently the leadership.
        指定者:
        hasLeadership 在接口中 LeaderElectionService
        返回:
        true if the associated LeaderContender is the leader, otherwise false

      • isLeader

        public void isLeader()
        指定者:
